title: 107_s1519
content: Amends the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to establish a program to provide a farm or ranch owner or operator reservist or National Guard member activated on or after September 11, 2001, an owner or operator of a farm or ranch who is a family member of the activated reservist, or a farm or ranch owner or operator employing activated reservists with specified farm credit assistance, including loan modification, debt restructuring, and emergency loans.
